recipes.title: Creamy Pasta Delight
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Prepare creamy sauce in a large skillet.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, and pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water before draining.
Add the hot, drained pasta to the skillet.
Remove from heat and quickly add the egg mixture, tossing constantly.
Add pasta water gradually if needed to achieve the right consistency.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

recipes.title: Creamy Fettuccine
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions
Heat cream and butter in a large pan
Add cooked pasta to the cream mixture

recipes.title: Spicy Grilled Chicken
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate with spices for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large skillet and cook marinated chicken until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken and set aside. In the same pan, sauté diced onion until softened.
Add minced garlic and herbs, cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add seasoning and simmer for 10 minutes until sauce thickens.
Return chicken to the pan and toss to combine.
Simmer for 5-10 minutes until heated through and flavors combine.
Serve hot with rice and bread.

recipes.title: Creamy Butter Chicken
instructions: Finish with cream and serve with bread

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Place lettuce in a large salad bowl.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss well.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add taco seasoning and cook according to package instructions.
Warm taco shells in the oven or microwave.
Prepare toppings: shred lettuce, dice tomatoes, grate cheese.
Fill taco shells with beef and desired toppings.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream together butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla.
Gradually mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
instructions: Cut cucumbers and tomatoes into chunks.
Combine vegetables in a large bowl.
Add olives and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt, pepper, and oregano.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper
Brush with olive oil and minced garlic

recipes.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast sweet potato cubes at 400°F for 25 minutes
Assemble bowl with quinoa, vegetables, and avocado

recipes.title: Christmas Turkey
instructions: Prepare herb butter with fresh rosemary and thyme
Stuff turkey cavity with orange and herbs
Rub herb butter under and over skin
Roast for 3-4 hours until internal temp reaches 165°F

recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
instructions: Whisk in pumpkin puree and spices
Top with spiced pumpkin milk foam

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Sprinkle with sea salt and black pepper

recipes.title: Sambar
instructions: Cook toor dal in pressure cooker until soft and mushy
Extract tamarind juice and boil with vegetables
Add cooked dal and sambar powder
Temper with mustard seeds, curry leaves in oil
Add tempering to sambar and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot

recipes.title: Rasam
instructions: Boil chopped tomatoes until soft and mash well
Add tamarind juice, rasam powder and turmeric
Add salt and jaggery, bring to boil
In a pan, roast cumin and pepper, powder it
Add the powder to rasam and simmer
Temper with ghee, mustard seeds and curry leaves
Garnish with coriander and serve hot

recipes.title: Curd Rice (Thayir Sadam)
instructions: Mash cooked rice when slightly warm
Add curd and milk, mix well
Add salt and chopped ginger, green chilies
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
When they splutter, add curry leaves
Garnish with pomegranate seeds and serve

recipes.title: Lemon Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds
Add chana dal, urad dal and let them brown
Add peanuts, red chilies and curry leaves
Add turmeric powder and cooked rice
Mix gently without breaking rice grains
Add salt and fresh lemon juice
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve

recipes.title: Idli
instructions: Soak rice and urad dal separately for 4-6 hours
Grind urad dal to smooth fluffy batter
Grind rice to slightly coarse batter
Mix both batters, add salt and ferment 8-10 hours
Pour batter into molds and steam for 10-12 minutes
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Dosa
instructions: Heat non-stick tawa on medium flame
Pour a ladle of batter in center
Spread in circular motion to make thin crepe
Cook until bottom turns golden brown
Serve hot with sambar and coconut chutney

recipes.title: Chicken Chettinad
instructions: Dry roast coconut, poppy seeds, fennel, coriander seeds and red chilies
Grind to fine paste with little water
Marinate chicken with turmeric, salt for 30 minutes
Heat oil, fry chicken pieces until half cooked
In same oil, sauté onions until golden
Add tomatoes and ground spice paste
Add chicken and cook covered for 20 minutes
Garnish with curry leaves and serve hot

recipes.title: Murukku
instructions: Mix rice flour, urad dal flour, salt, asafoetida
Add cumin seeds, sesame seeds and melted butter
Add water gradually to make smooth dough
Press murukku in spiral shape directly into hot oil
Store in airtight container when cool

recipes.title: Mysore Pak
instructions: Roast besan in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Make sugar syrup with water until one string consistency
Add roasted besan to syrup, mix continuously
Add remaining ghee little by little while stirring
Cook until mixture leaves pan sides
Pour into greased tray and cut when cool

recipes.title: Filter Coffee
instructions: Add coffee powder to filter top compartment
Pour hot water over coffee powder
Let it drip slowly for 10-15 minutes
Boil milk with sugar in a pot
Mix 2-3 tbsp coffee decoction with hot milk
Pour from height between two tumblers for froth
Serve hot in traditional steel tumbler and davara

recipes.title: Vada (Medu Vada)
instructions: Soak urad dal for 3-4 hours, drain completely
Grind to fluffy batter without adding water
Add salt, chopped chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Wet hands, take batter and shape into donut with hole
Fry until golden brown and crispy
Serve hot with sambar and coconut chutney

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Parboil rice with whole spices until 70% cooked
Marinate vegetables with yogurt and biryani masala
Sprinkle fried onions, mint, saffron milk
Cover and cook on dum for 45 minutes
Serve with raita and boiled eggs

recipes.title: Tamarind Rice (Puli Sadam)
instructions: Heat sesame oil, add mustard seeds
Add peanuts, red chilies, curry leaves
Add tamarind paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add jaggery, sambar powder and salt
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Cook for 5 minutes on low heat
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Grind coconut, green chilies, ginger to coarse paste
Add urad dal, chana dal, let them brown
Add ground coconut paste and salt
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Cook for 5 minutes until well combined
Serve warm or at room temperature

recipes.title: Pongal (Ven Pongal)
instructions: Dry roast rice and moong dal separately
Boil water, add roasted rice and dal
Cook until soft and mushy like khichdi
Heat ghee, add cumin seeds and black pepper
When cashews turn golden, add curry leaves
Pour this tempering over cooked pongal
Mix well, add salt and serve hot

recipes.title: Beans Poriyal
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add green chilies and curry leaves
Cover and cook until beans are tender
Cook for 2 minutes and serve hot

recipes.title: Jigarthanda
instructions: Soak badam pisin in water for 2 hours
Boil china grass in water until dissolved
Boil milk with sugar until thick
Add dissolved china grass to milk
Blend half the set mixture with ice
Layer with ice cream, almonds, nannari syrup

recipes.title: Lemon Rice
instructions: Add mustard seeds and let them splutter
Add curry leaves and green chilies
Add lemon juice and mix well
Serve hot or at room temperature

recipes.title: Tamarind Rice (Puli Sadam)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pan
Add mustard seeds and fenugreek seeds
Add red chilies and curry leaves
Add tamarind paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add salt and cook until thick
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Let it rest for 30 minutes before serving

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Add mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal
Add green chilies and curry leaves
Add cooked rice and mix gently

recipes.title: Tomato Rice
instructions: Cook rice with salt and keep aside
Heat oil and saute onions until golden
Add cooked rice and mix gently

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours
Top with fried onions, mint, coriander
Serve hot with boiled eggs and raita

recipes.title: Mutton Biryani
instructions: Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices overnight
Layer mutton and rice in heavy-bottomed pot
Top with saffron soaked in warm milk

recipes.title: Fish Biryani
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Shallow fry fish pieces until golden
Prepare masala with onions and spices
Top with herbs and fried onions

recipes.title: Curd Semiya
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add urad dal, green chilies, curry leaves

recipes.title: Pongal (Ven Pongal)
instructions: Pressure cook rice and dal together
Add cumin, pepper, ginger, curry leaves
Add cashews and fry until golden
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Vada (Medu Vada)
instructions: Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Shape batter into donuts and fry
Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add onions, green chilies, curry leaves
Heat dosa pan and spread batter

recipes.title: Rava Dosa
instructions: Mix rava, rice flour, and maida
Add water to make thin batter
Cook until crispy and serve hot

recipes.title: Onion Uthappam
instructions: Serve hot with sambar and chutney

recipes.title: Kal Dosa
instructions: Mix batter with onions and chilies
Cook on high heat until crispy

recipes.title: Appam
instructions: Grind rice with coconut and cooked rice
Add yeast and sugar to batter
Pour batter and swirl to coat
Cover and cook until edges are golden
Serve with stew or coconut milk

recipes.title: Idiappam (String Hoppers)
instructions: Boil water with salt and oil
Add rice flour gradually while stirring
Serve with curry or sweetened coconut milk

recipes.title: Puttu (Rice Puttu)
instructions: Rub flour until it forms breadcrumbs
Layer flour and coconut in puttu maker

recipes.title: Adai (Lentil Crepe)
instructions: Soak rice and dals for 3 hours
Heat pan and spread batter thick

recipes.title: Mutton Kuzhambu
instructions: Heat oil and add ground paste
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy

recipes.title: Nandu Kuzhambu (Crab Curry)
instructions: Clean and cut crab into pieces
Heat coconut oil in heavy pan
Add onions and cook until golden
Add crab pieces and cook covered
Simmer until crab is cooked through

recipes.title: Meen Kuzhambu (Fish Curry)
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Heat oil and fry fish lightly
In same oil, add onions and tomato
Add sambar powder and tamarind juice
Add fish and simmer for 5 minutes

recipes.title: Kozhi Milagu Kuzhambu (Pepper Chicken Curry)
instructions: Dry roast pepper, fennel, poppy seeds
Grind with coconut to fine paste
Heat oil and fry chicken until golden
Add ground paste and cook well
Add water and simmer until thick

recipes.title: Vatha Kuzhambu
instructions: Heat sesame oil and add mustard seeds
Simmer until oil floats on top

recipes.title: Kara Kuzhambu
instructions: Dry roast red chilies and coriander
Heat oil and add mustard seeds

recipes.title: Puli Kuzhambu
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add tamarind juice and bring to boil

recipes.title: Mor Kuzhambu (Curd Curry)
instructions: Grind coconut with green chilies and ginger
Beat yogurt and mix with ground paste
Add yogurt mixture to cooked vegetables
Heat on low flame without boiling
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Pour tempering over curry and serve

recipes.title: Kadalai Kuzhambu (Chickpea Curry)
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight and pressure cook
Add tomato and cook until soft

recipes.title: Kuzhi Paniyaram
instructions: Heat oil in each cavity of paniyaram pan
Add mustard seeds and let them splutter
Add onions, green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Cook on medium heat until golden
Turn each paniyaram using a skewer
Cook until both sides are golden

recipes.title: Upma (Rava Upma)
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Add onions and saute until translucent
Add water and bring to boil
Slowly add roasted semolina while stirring

recipes.title: Thattai
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients except oil
Add hot oil (2 tbsp) to the flour mixture
Add water gradually to form stiff dough
Add curry leaves and sesame seeds
Make small balls and flatten into discs
Fry thattai until golden and crispy

recipes.title: Seedai (Uppu Seedai & Vella Seedai)
instructions: Dry roast rice flour until aromatic
Mix urad dal flour and coconut
For sweet version, melt jaggery with little water
For savory version, use salt and cumin
Mix all ingredients with hot ghee
Add liquid gradually to form tight dough
Deep fry until golden and puffed

recipes.title: Mixture
instructions: Mix gram flour, rice flour with spices
Add water to make thick batter

recipes.title: Mysore Pak
instructions: Roast gram flour in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Add roasted flour to hot syrup
Cook until mixture leaves the pan

recipes.title: Jangiri
instructions: Make sugar syrup of one string consistency
Add cardamom and color to syrup
Pipe batter in spiral shape and fry
Dip hot jangiri in warm syrup

recipes.title: Paal Payasam
instructions: Wash and pressure cook rice until very soft
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee

recipes.title: Semiya Payasam
instructions: Roast vermicelli in ghee until golden
Boil milk in a heavy pan
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee

recipes.title: Rava Kesari
instructions: Roast semolina in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Add roasted semolina slowly while stirring

recipes.title: Sweet Pongal (Sakkarai Pongal)
instructions: Pressure cook rice and dal with milk
Add jaggery syrup to rice mixture
Cook on low heat stirring continuously
Fry cashews, raisins and add to pongal

recipes.title: Arisi Upma
instructions: Dry roast rice until light golden
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Add onions and saute until soft
Add water and bring to boil
Slowly add rice powder while stirring
Cook until water is absorbed and serve hot

recipes.title: Kuthiraivali Upma (Barnyard Millet)
instructions: Dry roast barnyard millet until aromatic
Add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add roasted millet and fry for 2 minutes
Cook covered until millet is tender
Garnish with curry leaves and serve

recipes.title: Varagu Upma (Kodo Millet)
instructions: Wash and dry roast kodo millet
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Fluff with fork and serve hot

recipes.title: Thinai Pongal (Foxtail Millet Pongal)
instructions: Pressure cook millet and dal together
Heat ghee and add cumin, pepper

recipes.title: Bisibele Bath
instructions: Cook rice and dal together until mushy
Add bisibele bath powder to ghee

recipes.title: Rava Kichadi
instructions: Dry roast semolina until light golden
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add water and bring to boil

recipes.title: Poori with Potato Masala
instructions: Make stiff dough with wheat flour
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Serve hot pooris with potato masala

recipes.title: Chapati with Kurma
instructions: Make soft dough with wheat flour
Add garam masala and cooked vegetables
Roll and cook chapatis on tawa

recipes.title: Parotta (Tamil style)
instructions: Make soft elastic dough with maida
Apply oil and fold into layers
Roll gently and cook on tawa
Apply ghee while cooking both sides

recipes.title: Kothu Parotta
instructions: Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Mix well and add garam masala

recipes.title: Mutta Parotta (Egg Parotta)
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and turmeric
Pour beaten eggs and scramble lightly
Place parotta on top of eggs

recipes.title: Vazhaipoo Vadai (Banana Flower Vada)
instructions: Clean banana flower and chop finely
Grind dal coarsely with red chilies
Mix chopped banana flower with ground dal
Shape into small balls and flatten

recipes.title: Vazhaikkai Varuval (Raw Banana Fry)
instructions: Peel and cut banana into rounds
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and banana pieces
Add chili powder and coriander powder

recipes.title: Kathirikai Varuval (Brinjal Fry)
instructions: Cut brinjal into cubes and soak in salt water
Heat oil and fry brinjal until golden
In same oil, add onions and tomatoes

recipes.title: Vendakkai Poriyal (Ladies Finger Fry)
instructions: Wash and cut ladies finger into rounds
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add urad dal and curry leaves
Cook on medium heat without water

recipes.title: Keerai Kootu (Spinach Kootu)
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds

recipes.title: Pakoda
instructions: Add water to make thick batter
Drop spoonfuls of batter in oil

recipes.title: Onion Bajji
instructions: Mix gram flour, rice flour, spices

recipes.title: Milagai Bajji (Chili Bajji)
instructions: Slit chilies and remove seeds if desired
Mix gram flour, rice flour, spices

recipes.title: Vazhakkai Bajji (Banana Bajji)
instructions: Peel and slice banana into rounds
Mix gram flour, rice flour, spices
Add ginger paste and curry leaves

recipes.title: Sundal (Navaratri special)
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight and pressure cook
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves

recipes.title: Masala Vadai
instructions: Grind coarsely with red chilies and ginger
Add chopped onions and curry leaves
Shape into small balls and flatten

recipes.title: Paruppu Vadai
instructions: Mix in curry leaves and coconut

recipes.title: Samosa (Tamil style)
instructions: Make stiff dough with maida and oil
Add green chilies and green peas
Add mashed potatoes and garam masala
Roll dough and make samosa cones
Fill with potato mixture and seal

recipes.title: Kaara Sev
instructions: Mix gram flour, rice flour, spices
Add hot oil to the flour mixture
Add water gradually to make stiff dough
Make sev directly into hot oil

recipes.title: Gulab Jamun
instructions: Knead khova with maida until smooth
Fry balls on low heat until golden
Add hot jamuns to warm syrup

recipes.title: Rasagulla
instructions: Boil milk and add lemon juice
Add paneer balls to boiling syrup

recipes.title: Aval Payasam
instructions: Fry cashews and raisins in ghee

recipes.title: Kasi Halwa (Poosanikai Halwa)
instructions: Cook grated gourd until water evaporates
Add sugar and cook until thick
Cook until it leaves the pan

recipes.title: Ashoka Halwa (Thiruvaiyaru special)
instructions: Dry roast moong dal until aromatic
Cook until it leaves the pan

recipes.title: Karupatti Halwa (Palm Jaggery Halwa)
instructions: Roast wheat flour in ghee until aromatic
Add jaggery syrup to roasted flour
Fry cashews and add to halwa
Cook until it leaves the pan

recipes.title: Adhirasam
instructions: Soak rice for 3 hours and dry
Add rice flour to hot syrup
Deep fry in sesame oil until brown

recipes.title: Nei Appam
instructions: Mix rice flour with coconut milk
Add jaggery syrup to rice flour

recipes.title: Poli (Paruppu Poli)
instructions: Make soft dough with maida and ghee
Cook until thick, add coconut and cardamom
Make balls from dough and filling

recipes.title: Coconut Poli
instructions: Add cardamom and cook until dry

recipes.title: Boondi Laddu
instructions: Make smooth batter with gram flour
Heat oil and make small boondis
Make sugar syrup of one string consistency
Add hot boondis to warm syrup

recipes.title: Ellu Urundai (Sesame Balls)
instructions: Dry roast sesame seeds until aromatic
Mix well and cook for 2 minutes
Cool slightly and shape into balls

recipes.title: Pori Urundai
instructions: Add jaggery and melt with little water
Cook until it forms soft ball stage
Add puffed rice and mix quickly

recipes.title: Kadalai Urundai (Peanut Balls)
instructions: Dry roast peanuts and remove skin
Cool slightly and shape into balls

recipes.title: Coconut Burfi
instructions: Cook until mixture leaves the pan

recipes.title: Sukku Coffee (Dry Ginger Coffee)
instructions: Boil water with dry ginger powder
Can add lemon juice if desired

recipes.title: Kara Boondi
instructions: Mix gram flour with spices and salt
Add water to make smooth batter

recipes.title: Paniyaram (Sweet/Spicy)
instructions: Mix rice flour with coconut milk
Melt jaggery and add to batter

recipes.title: Cabbage Poriyal
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add urad dal and curry leaves

recipes.title: Carrot Poriyal
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add chana dal and curry leaves

recipes.title: Potato Poriyal
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds

recipes.title: Drumstick Poriyal
instructions: Grind coconut with green chilies and cumin
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Cook with little water until tender

recipes.title: Puliyodarai (Temple style Tamarind Rice)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in heavy-bottomed pan
Add mustard seeds and fenugreek seeds
Add peanuts and fry until golden
Add tamarind juice and bring to boil
Add cooked rice and mix gently
Let it rest for 30 minutes before serving

recipes.title: Kuzhambu Varieties - Sambar
instructions: Pressure cook toor dal with turmeric
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and sambar powder
Add tamarind juice and bring to boil

recipes.title: Traditional Rasam
instructions: Crush tomatoes and cook until soft
Heat ghee and add mustard seeds
Add cumin seeds and curry leaves

recipes.title: Kootu Varieties - Pumpkin Kootu
instructions: Grind coconut with green chilies and cumin
Cook pumpkin with turmeric and salt
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over kootu

recipes.title: Aviyal
instructions: Cook vegetables with turmeric and salt
Grind coconut with green chilies and cumin
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes
Heat coconut oil and add curry leaves

recipes.title: Karakozhambu
instructions: Dry roast red chilies and coriander
Grind with coconut to fine paste
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add tamarind juice and ground paste
Simmer until oil floats on top

recipes.title: Varuval Varieties - Fish Varuval
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
In same oil, add ginger-garlic paste
Add fried fish and curry leaves
Toss until well coated with spices

recipes.title: Chicken Varuval
instructions: Heat oil and fry chicken until cooked
Fry onions in same oil until golden
Add all spice powders and cook
Add fried chicken and curry leaves
Toss until dry and well coated

recipes.title: Mutton Varuval
instructions: Heat oil and fry onions until brown
Cook until mutton is well roasted
Serve hot with rice or roti

recipes.title: Poricha Kootu
instructions: Dry roast coconut, red chilies, cumin
Add cooked dal and ground paste
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over kootu

recipes.title: Coconut Chutney
instructions: Grind coconut with green chilies and ginger
Add roasted gram and little water
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over chutney

recipes.title: Tomato Chutney
instructions: Heat oil and fry red chilies and garlic
Cool and grind to coarse paste
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over chutney
Serve with rice or tiffin items

recipes.title: Mint Chutney
instructions: Grind with green chilies and ginger
Heat oil and add mustard seeds

recipes.title: Peanut Chutney
instructions: Heat oil and fry red chilies and garlic
Heat oil and add mustard seeds

recipes.title: Ginger Chutney
instructions: Heat oil and fry red chilies
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Good for digestion, serve with rice

recipes.title: Mango Pickle
instructions: Mix with salt and keep overnight
Add all spice powders and fry
Cool and mix with mango pieces

recipes.title: Lemon Pickle
instructions: Remove seeds and mix with salt
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Cool and mix with lemon pieces

recipes.title: Garlic Pickle
instructions: Mix with salt and keep for 4 hours
Heat oil and add mustard and fenugreek seeds
Add garlic and fry until golden

recipes.title: Mixed Vegetable Pickle
instructions: Mix with salt and keep for 6 hours
Heat oil and add pickle masala

recipes.title: Fish Pickle
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Heat oil and add ginger-garlic paste

recipes.title: Chicken Pickle
instructions: Heat oil and add ginger-garlic paste

recipes.title: Mutton Pickle
instructions: Heat oil and add ginger-garlic paste
Add all spice powders and fry
Add cooked mutton and mix well
Cook until mutton is well coated

recipes.title: Appam
instructions: Grind with coconut and cooked rice
Heat appam pan and pour batter
Swirl to form thick center and thin edges
Cover and cook until edges are golden
Serve hot with stew or coconut milk

recipes.title: Puttu
instructions: Sprinkle water and mix to breadcrumb consistency
Layer rice flour and coconut in puttu maker
Serve hot with banana and jaggery
Can also serve with kadala curry

recipes.title: Ragi Mudde
instructions: Slowly add ragi flour while stirring
Cook on low heat stirring continuously

recipes.title: Kollu Rasam
instructions: Extract thick and thin milk from cooked gram
Add horse gram water and boil
Add thick milk and bring to boil
Temper with ghee and curry leaves

recipes.title: Neer More
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over

recipes.title: Ellu Sadam
instructions: Dry roast sesame seeds until golden
Grind both with salt to coarse powder
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add tempered oil and mix well

recipes.title: Vendhaya Keerai Masiyal
instructions: Cook with toor dal and turmeric
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over

recipes.title: Vazhaipoo Vadai
instructions: Clean banana flower and chop finely
Grind dal coarsely with chilies and ginger
Add fennel seeds, curry leaves, salt

recipes.title: Thengai Burfi
instructions: Cook coconut with milk until thick

recipes.title: Ragi Dosa
instructions: Add water to make thin batter

recipes.title: Pesarattu
instructions: Grind with green chilies, ginger, cumin
Add salt and make thick batter

recipes.title: Idiappam (String Hoppers)
instructions: Boil water with salt and oil
Add rice flour slowly while stirring
Cook until it forms a dough
Press through idiappam maker onto banana leaves
Can serve with stew or sugar

recipes.title: Wheat Rava Upma
instructions: Dry roast wheat rava until aromatic
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Add onions and saute until soft
Add water and bring to boil
Slowly add roasted rava while stirring

recipes.title: Chettinad Chicken Curry
instructions: Dry roast coconut, poppy seeds, fennel, coriander, red chilies
Grind to fine paste with little water
Marinate chicken with turmeric and salt
Heat oil and fry chicken until golden
In same oil, saute onions until brown
Add tomatoes and ground spice paste
Serve hot with rice or roti

recipes.title: Chettinad Mutton Curry
instructions: Pressure cook mutton with onions until tender
Dry roast coconut, poppy seeds, star anise, red chilies, coriander
Heat oil and add ginger-garlic paste
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy
Add ground spice paste and fry
Serve hot with rice or parotta

recipes.title: Thenkuzhal
instructions: Mix rice flour, urad dal flour, salt, asafoetida
Add sesame seeds and cumin seeds
Add water gradually to make smooth dough
Press directly into hot oil in coil shape
Fry until golden and store in airtight container

recipes.title: Ribbon Pakoda
instructions: Mix rice flour, gram flour, spices, and salt
Add hot oil to the mixture
Add water to make stiff dough
Press dough through maker directly into oil

recipes.title: Kai Murukku
instructions: Add melted butter and mix well
Add water to make smooth dough
Take small portions and shape by hand
Cool and store in airtight container

recipes.title: Banana Chips
instructions: Slice into thin rounds using slicer
Mix turmeric and salt with little water
Dip banana slices in turmeric water
Heat coconut oil for deep frying
Store in airtight container when cool

recipes.title: Meen Varuval (Fish Fry)
instructions: Clean fish and make shallow cuts
Mix all spice powders with ginger-garlic paste
Add lemon juice to make thick paste
Marinate fish with spice paste for 30 minutes
Fry fish pieces until golden brown
Cook until crispy on both sides
Serve hot with onion rings and lemon

recipes.title: Nethili Fry (Anchovy Fry)
instructions: Mix all spice powders with ginger-garlic paste
Marinate anchovies with spice mix for 15 minutes
Add curry leaves and marinated fish
Fry on medium heat until crispy
Serve hot with rice and rasam

recipes.title: Prawn Masala
instructions: Marinate prawns with turmeric and salt
Heat oil and fry prawns lightly
In same oil, saute onions until golden
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add all spice powders and cook
Add coconut milk and bring to boil
Add fried prawns and curry leaves

recipes.title: Crab Curry
instructions: Clean and cut crab into pieces
Heat coconut oil in heavy pan
Add onions and cook until soft
Add tamarind juice and bring to boil
Add crab pieces and cook covered
Add coconut milk and curry leaves

recipes.title: Vanjaram Fish Fry (Seer Fish)
instructions: Mix all spice powders with ginger-garlic paste
Add lemon juice to make marinade
Cook until crispy outside, tender inside

recipes.title: Karuvadu Kuzhambu (Dry Fish Curry)
instructions: Soak dry fish in warm water for 10 minutes
Heat oil and add dry fish
In same oil, add onions and tomato
Add fried fish and curry leaves

recipes.title: Squid Fry
instructions: Clean squid and cut into rings
Mix all spice powders with ginger-garlic paste
Add curry leaves and marinated squid
Fry on high heat for 5-7 minutes

recipes.title: Fish 65
instructions: Mix chili powder, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice
Mix corn flour and all purpose flour
Coat marinated fish with flour mixture
Fry fish until golden and crispy

recipes.title: Prawn Biryani
instructions: Clean and marinate prawns with yogurt and spices
Top with mint, fried onions, saffron

recipes.title: Nandu Rasam (Crab Rasam)
instructions: Boil crab shells to make stock
Crush tomato and cook until soft
Add tamarind juice and rasam powder
Add crab stock and bring to boil
Temper with ghee and curry leaves

recipes.title: Paniyaram (Sweet)
instructions: Mix rice flour with coconut milk
Add jaggery syrup to rice flour
Cook until golden brown on both sides

recipes.title: Potato Bonda
instructions: Add green chilies, ginger, curry leaves
Make small balls from potato mixture
Mix gram flour, rice flour with water

recipes.title: Akkaravadisal
instructions: Pressure cook rice and dal with milk
Strain and add to rice mixture
Cook on low heat stirring continuously
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee

recipes.title: Jangiri
instructions: Make sugar syrup of one string consistency
Add cardamom and color to syrup
Pipe batter in spiral shape and fry
Dip hot jangiri in warm syrup

recipes.title: Masala Chai
instructions: Boil water with ginger, cardamom, cinnamon
Add tea leaves and boil for 2 minutes

recipes.title: Tirunelveli Halwa
instructions: Soak wheat overnight and grind to paste
Cook until halwa leaves the pan

recipes.title: Egg Curry
instructions: Heat oil and fry eggs lightly
In same oil, saute onions until golden
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add all spice powders and cook
Add coconut milk and bring to boil
Add fried eggs and curry leaves
Serve hot with rice or roti

title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Fry onions and cashews until golden
Heat butter and add tomato puree

title: Mutton Kuzhambu
instructions: Roast and grind coconut with spices

title: Chicken Chettinad
instructions: Roast coconut with spices until brown

title: Fish Molee
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Heat oil and fry onions until soft
Add thin coconut milk and bring to boil

title: Egg Curry
instructions: Fry eggs lightly and keep aside
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy

title: Vendakkai Puli Kuzhambu
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over

title: Mor Kuzhambu
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over

title: Keerai Molagootal
instructions: Add ground paste to cooked vegetables
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over

title: Arai Keerai Masiyal
instructions: Cook with toor dal and turmeric
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and pour over

title: Mullangi Sambar
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds

title: Kara Kozhambu
instructions: Add turmeric and cook until tender
Heat oil and add mustard seeds

title: Nei Payasam
instructions: Cook rice in milk until soft
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee

title: Kesari
instructions: Roast sooji in ghee until fragrant

title: Adhirasam
instructions: Make jaggery syrup to soft ball stage

title: Onion Pakoda
instructions: Add all spices and curry leaves

title: Potato Bonda
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds

title: Mysore Pak
instructions: Make sugar syrup to string consistency
Add besan and roast on low heat
Pour in greased tray when done

title: Filter Coffee
instructions: Add coffee powder to filter top

title: Masala Chai
instructions: Boil water with ginger and cardamom
Can add other spices like cinnamon

title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Grind coconut with green chilies and ginger
Heat oil and add mustard seeds
